amendment.description: Amendment required the Defense Secretary, Secretary of State, and USAID Administrator to establish a standing advisory panel to improve integration on matters of national security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-666 to require the Defense Secretary, Secretary of State, and USAID Administrator to establish a standing advisory panel to improve integration on matters of national security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Skelton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
